description:
Elijah is an intellectual type of guy. Real cerebral and looks at life from all possible angles.
I never know what keywords to pick for bearded guys. I have the keyword "Hairy" and he certainly doesn't have a hairy chest, but I guess the beard qualifies in my head as "hairy". And I am always happy to get guys of different looks that also have an innate sexiness about them.
He's got a hot 'lil bod with a pretty hefty porn cock. Once again, it was awesome to work with someone who got off to being filmed.
Elijah likes dudes, and I may mix him in with some of the other guys, but I don't have anything definite as of this writing.
Enjoy!
title: Elijah - Solo
